mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER ) VALUES( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.delete: UPDATE BOARD SET SHOW='N' WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{bno} AND SHOW = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET VIEWCNT = VIEWCNT+1 WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{bno} AND SHOW = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = (SELECT MAX(BNO) FROM BOARD WHERE SHOW='Y' AND BNO < #{bno})
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = (SELECT MIN(BNO) FROM BOARD WHERE SHOW='Y' AND BNO > #{bno})

choose.when: WHERE SHOW='Y' AND (WRITER LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CONTENT LIKE LOWER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR CONTENT LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR TITLE LIKE LOWER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR TITLE LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )
choose.otherwise: WHERE SHOW='Y' AND (${searchOption} LIKE LOWER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR ${searchOption} LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%'))
